title: Tool Usage
description: Tool usage comprises the most common steps used in a site tool or utility, such as calculators, registrations, and requests for more information.

toolUsageCancelled.title: Tool Usage Cancelled
toolUsageCancelled.description: Captured when a visitor cancels out of a tool usage process.

toolUsageComplete.title: Tool Usage Complete
toolUsageComplete.description: Captured when a visitor successfully finishes using any type of tool or utility on the site/app.

toolUsageFailure.title: Tool Usage Failed
toolUsageFailure.description: Captured when a step in the tool usage process fails.

toolUsageID.title: Tool Usage ID
toolUsageID.description: Captures the ID of the tool process utilized, if applicable.  For example, this could be a claim, application, or booking ID, etc.

toolUsageName.title: Tool Usage Name
toolUsageName.description: Tracks the name of the tool in use.

toolUsageSaved.title: Tool Usage Saved
toolUsageSaved.description: Captured when a visitor saves and exits a tool usage process.

toolUsageStart.title: Tool Usage Start
toolUsageStart.description: Captured when a visitor initializes using any type of tool or utility on the site/app.

toolUsageStep.title: Tool Usage Step
toolUsageStep.description: Captured when any intermediary tool step is started on the site/app.

toolUsageStepName.title: Tool Usage Step Name
toolUsageStepName.description: Tracks the name of the tool step in use.

toolUsageSubmitted.title: Tool Usage Submitted
toolUsageSubmitted.description: Captured when a visitor submits data during a tool step.  Not necessarily synonymous with a successful event.

toolUsageType.title: Tool Usage Type
toolUsageType.description: Tracks the type or category of the tool in use.
